item.title: Sungha Jung
item.description: Sungha Jung is a South Korean musician who specializes in acoustic fingerstyle guitar. Jung creates acoustic covers and arrangements, typically by ear and/or by watching videos, and has original music, which he plays and uploads online. He is often described as a guitar prodigy, though he prefers to be known as a 'guitarist' rather than a 'prodigy'. His YouTube channel currently has more than 5 million subscribers.
